title: Duration of personal jurisdiction
context: ยง576B-202 Duration of personal jurisdiction. Personal jurisdiction acquired by a tribunal of this State in a proceeding under this chapter or other law of this State relating to a support order continues as long as a tribunal of this State has continuing, exclusive jurisdiction to modify its order or continuing jurisdiction to enforce its order as provided by sections 576B-205, 576B-206, and 576B-211. [L 1997, c 295, pt of ยง1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of ยง1]
